send_to_cs: Shipping inquiries on a current order
For product or general inquiries you can't find the answer to, use PGI shortcut
escalate: No escalations for this client, send everything to CS
tone: Don't use the word "unfortunately" to discuss our appointment structure
Don't use the word "best" to reference a product (e.g., best ring, etc.)
templates: If cx are looking for an engagement ring and don't provide specifics, use LER shortcut
dos_and_donts: If the customer responds incorrectly to the journey, don't send jny temp, recommend items based on their selection instead
Cx can create their own engagement ring on the webiste by choosing a setting, stone and size
Cx can customize rings by working with designers who will use their ideas, drawings, images to create the ring they want
Don't disclose the locations of their labs/production facilities
drive_to_purchase: **Be MORE SALESY, if the customer is showing intent to purchase then:**
**‚ûú Ask open-ended general questions such as style & material**
‚ûú After asking open-ended questions, transition to specific questions such as center stone, etc.
‚ûú If the customer liked our recommendation, push for the sale by asking about payment options or when they hope to have the item
promo_and_exclusions: Please see here for current offer details: https://www.brilliantearth.com/promo-codes-and-offers/

escalation_preferences: For questions regarding order, service, shipping questions on a current order, post-purchase will go to cssupport@brilliantearth.com
For product or general inquiry questions, please contact info@brilliantearth.com

I still need assistance with my account

SNIPES: I'm very sorry to hear this happened. I totally understand the frustration with this! Our team handles emails in the order they come in and sending additional ones will further delay the team's response. Rest assured that one of my colleagues will follow up with you in no time!

Over the past week, my account has been subject to purchase restrictions due to fraud prevention measures. These restrictions are currently only in effect on your website, as my bank has already resolved the card restriction. I kindly request that you forward my case to a representative who can assist me.
I have consistently encountered issues with returning purchases. One instance involved a single item being canceled without being credited. I took the initiative to visit a physical store to seek assistance from your retail associates. They promptly issued me a gift card to complete my online order after undergoing the entire verification process at the store.
Therefore, I kindly request your assistance in resolving this matter.

SNIPES: I'm sorry to hear about that. I'm really sorry for all the inconvenience. Kindly wait for our team's response. We are dealing with an influx of support messages but this does not make your concern any less important. The team is working as hard as possible to address each issue promptly. I know my apologies won't help in this situation but rest assured, I understand how frustrating this can be and I'm very sorry I can't provide you with an immediate solution. I'm thankful for your patience and understanding.
SNIPES: Just dropped. Nike Air Max2 CB 94, Pegasus Premium in new colorways, adidas Samba Jane, & more. Shop now: snipes.attn.tv/ayXokT3LqmiW
SNIPES: Air Jordan 4 Retro "Flight Club" early reserve is live! Use your email georgeg21990@gmail.com to join the VIP queue. Join here: snipes.attn.tv/aq9rGikZVOR4
SNIPES: If you had trouble entering the Air Jordan 4 Retro "Flight Club" queue, please try again using the same email as your Reserve account. Join the VIP Queue here: snipes.attn.tv/aD0T6iCOuIeE .
My account is still restricted

SNIPES: I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. I want to assure you that we take each request very seriously and are doing our best to respond to everyone as promptly as possible. Your concern is very important to us, and I promise that a member of our team will get back to you as soon as possible. We hope for your continued understanding, and thank you for allowing us to assist you.
